name: Product Category Discounts for Woo
author: WildProgrammers

sections.description:
Product Category Discounts allows you to provide discounts based on WooCommerce Product Categories. Now you can apply a discount to thousands of products, within 2 minutes.

Features
* Apply discounts to products based on WooCommerce product categories.
* Apply discounts to all the products in 2 minutes.
* Applies minimum discount, if multiple discount categories are selected.

Suspicious? Try it out here, its free..!!

PRO VERSION Features
1. Create endless discount rules from newly created “Discount Category” and simply assign them to the product.
2. Add thousands of product to discount category, instead of editing each product.
3. Allows you to add multiple discount rules to product and add priority to the discounts getting applied.
4. Choose if you want to apply maximum/minimum discount when a product has multiple categories with same priority.
5. Schedule timely discount in future.
6. Increase your returning customers by giving discount coupon instead of on purchase discount.
7. Allows to assign products to Discount Category on Discount Category add/edit page.

Video Tutorial – PRO VERSION
Creating discount rules and assigning to products is really easy, thanks to “Discount Category”. Please check video to get overall idea.

Category Discounts provides an excellent feature by allowing you to decide when you want to provide the discount. By default, the plugin provides the discount for current purchase. However, you can also provide the discount to your customers for next purchase, i.e. if you are going to give $20 discount to your customer for current purchase that instead of providing the discount, give them a coupon which can be used for next purchase. Check out video to learn how to configure the plugin to do so.

Category Discounts provides you seamless feature of applying products to your categories, instead of going to each product and assigning “Discount Categories” to it. By this way you can setup discount on multiple products by simply selecting them, without any hassles. Check out video to learn how to configure the plugin to do so.

SOUNDS INTRESTING..? Check our PRO Version

Documentation
Please check Documentation

  • Category Discounts for WooCommerce
sections.installation:
1. The installation of the plugin is just like any other plugin installation for WordPress. Login to your WordPress site and go to Plugins > Add New.
    1. At the Install Plugins Page click on Upload from the top navigation and then click on browse.
    2. Go to the location on your computer where you saved the downloaded plugin zip file and upload this zipped file.
    3. Now click on Install Now.
    4. Wait until WordPress has uploaded the file. If it’s done click on Activate Plugin.
    5. Now you should see a message ‘Plugin activated’ at the top of the window.
sections.faq:
What type of discounts does plugin provide..?

The plugin provides below discount types:-
* Flat Discount
* Percentage Discount
* Fixed Price

Does this plugin really requires some basic skills to setup..?

No. Not at all. Just install the plugin and follow our documentation. We are sure that anybody can do this easily.

Can I provide discounts for specific user roles?

This is the lite version of the plugin. You can use this feature in our pro version. Check out the documentation from here

Is there any option to decide whether I want to give discounts to my customer after purchase or during purchase..?

Yes. It is possible but it is not part of the lite plugin. You must buy our pro plugin from here

Where can I receive support for this plugin..?

You can contact us directly at contact@wildprogrammers.com, we will be more than happy to help you.

short_description: Product Category Discounts allows you to manage discounts for your WooCommerce store in an intelligent yet simple ways.
